product_name: Lost Horizons Junta Earflap Hat - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: Handcrafted in Nepal, the Lost Horizons Junta earflap hat keeps your head warm when it's cold with its wool exterior and a polyester fleece lining. Wool is a natural insulator: warm, soft and breathable to keep you comfortable in the great outdoors. Polyester fleece lining wicks moisture and is soft next to skin; earflap design keeps your entire head warm. Dry clean or hand wash in cold water; lay flat to dry. Special buy.
